note: BIG-Bench Hard. 23 challenging tasks from BIG-Bench. Evaluation-only benchmark.
Logic grid puzzle benchmark. Features controllable complexity levels.
Knowledge-Orthogonal Reasoning Benchmark. 5 task categories: Operation, Logic, Cipher, Puzzle, Counterfactual.
Knights and Knaves logical reasoning benchmark. Includes training data and puzzles with varying numbers of people (2-8).
BIG-Bench Extra Hard. Replaces each BBH task with a more difficult version.
